@crankysolicitor Naira = No Value

If done judiciously:

Daily Contribution = 500 Naira.
Total Contribution = 500 x 365 = 182,500 Naira.

Profit Accrued = 46,647 Naira.
Percentage Profit = 25%.

Total Value = Contribution + Profit Accrued.

182,500 + 46,647 = 229,147.
Total Payout Equals 229,000.

The Contributory Phase

At this phase, the investor can make daily contribution of 500 Naira. 

The investor has the flexibility to make the contribution at his own pace; there is no time or value pressure whatsoever. 

This phase lasts for 12 months.

2011 -  1 USD = 162.3 NGN
2019 - 1 USD = 359.3593 NGN
So we can say that Nigerian minimum wage in 2011 was 113.58 USD while in 2019, it is 83.48 USD.
